mapper.insert: insert into whereabout(company_id, num, name, phone_number, email, grade, sex, profession, department, work_place) values (#{companyId},#{num},#{name},#{phoneNumber},#{email},#{grade},#{sex},#{profession},#{department},#{workPlace});
mapper.delete: delete from whereabout where company_id = #{companyId} and num = #{num};
